sent.orig: The six-man one line defense and the five -one defense are the most popular systems.
sent.trans: 6-0线防守阵形和5-1防守阵形是最常用的防守阵形。

sent.orig: To accelerate national defense development and achieve national defense and military modernization.
sent.trans: 加强国防建设，实现国防和军队现代化。

sent.orig: The skin is in bodily all organs takes a defense external environment most important defense line.
sent.trans: 皮肤是身体所有器官中负起防卫外在环境最重要的一道防线。

sent.orig: Feeding off the energy of their home fans, who shouted defense, defense!
sent.trans: 离开他们的家扇子的精力的饲养，谁呼喊了辩护，辩护！

sent.orig: China's efforts in defense modernization are purely for self-defense.
sent.trans: 中国的国防现代化建设完全是为了自卫。
